name.value: Marital Status NHS Data Model and Dictionary

description.value: A vocabulary that identifies the legal marital status of a person. This value set references the Person Marital Status Code from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

display.value: Divorced/Person whose Civil Partnership has been dissolved
